{"id":578222975,"lang":"cpp","time":"10Â months","timestamp":1635371965,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/578222975/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n    /*\n    Rem that x ^(-3) is equiavalent to 1/(x^3))\n    */\n        int N = n;\n        if(N <0){\n            N = -n;\n            x = 1/x;\n        }\n        \n        double ans = 1;\n        for(long long int i =0 ; i<N;i++){\n            ans = ans * x;\n        }\n        return ans ;\n        \n        \n        \n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
